body.p:
You can use one of the Improve SEO action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Marketing category to ask the AI Positron to improve the selected content for search engine indexing.

The Improve SEO AI action from a specific content is highly beneficial to end users because it helps enhance their online visibility and reach. By optimizing the content for search engines, the AI enables the website or content to rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs). This means that when users search for relevant keywords or phrases, they are more likely to find the content, resulting in increased organic traffic and potential customer engagement. The improved search engine optimizations AI action helps users gain a competitive edge, attract more visitors to their website, and potentially boost their online business or presence.
Open the topic, select its contents and use the AI Positron Assistant Marketing->Improve SEO action to improve the content to be easier indexed by search engines.
